message.content: {"id": "20249", "title": "Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help", "description": "Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help", "OB": "When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display help, and the help window should stay open for the user to read.", "EB": "When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 displays some help. However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read. If there is no F1 help defined, then pressing F1 should not display anything to avoid flashing. The same problem exists for the change viewer and change perspective menus. None of the actions under Window > Keyboard Shortcuts have any F1 help defined, so it's unclear what they do.", "SR": "When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display some help. However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read. If there is supposed to be F1 help defined for the change editor menu, then the help window should stay open for the user to read."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}

', 'SR': 'Build F2When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 will display some help.However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read.If there is supposed to be F1 defined for the change editor menu, then the helpwindow should stay open for the user to read.
